content: if you re looking for a relaxing project this crochet throw is perfect since after the first row is complete you can settle into a simple 1-row repeat designed in our super-bulky bernat blanket pattern uses a v_stitch which involves working a double_crochet a chain-1 space and another double_crochet - all into 1 space v-stitches in subsequent row are all worked into chain-1 spaces so it s easy to see and feel where to insert your hook pick any 2 shades for a classic striped design that suits your space add an optional single_crochet edging to complete this cozy throw
